attributes.action: Enable votes against petitions on this site.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Some people may feel as strongly against published petitions as the instigator feels for his or her submission. Changing the site to allow us to vote against as well as for would be more democratic, and may reduce the total number of petitions by removing the need to set up separate petition requests.

rejection.details: Comments on the petitions system should be sent to webmaster@pmo.gov.uk
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
